text: Milan Đuričić (, ; born 31 October 1961) is a Serbian retired footballer and current coach.He's the coach right now Radnički from Niš. His nickname is Đumi. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Yugoslav footballers Category:Yugoslav First League players Category:Association football defenders Category:Serbian football managers Category:Serbian expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Serbian SuperLiga managers Category:Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina managers Category:FK Vojvodina managers Category:FK Zemun managers Category:FK Radnički Niš managers Category:FK Zvijezda 09 managers Category:FK Partizan non-playing staff
title: Milan Đuričić (footballer, born 1961)
